actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refund of the excise tax on ozone-depleting chemicals to producers that cease producing such a chemical before the date the production of the chemical is prohibited.
short_title: Save the Ozone Layer Tax Credit

summary.text: Save the Ozone Layer Tax Credit - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for excise taxes paid by producers of ozone-depleting chemicals if such production ceases before the beginning of the year in which it is prohibited. Provides for determining such credit and whether cessation of production has occurred.

titles.title: Save the Ozone Layer Tax Credit

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refund of the excise tax on ozone-depleting chemicals to producers that cease producing such a chemical before the date the production of the chemical is prohibited.
